description: Navigate to Pallabi Bus Station. Walk straight along the main road, positioning yourself directly underneath the elevated metro rail structure. Continue forward for a short distance, moving parallel to the traffic of buses and rickshaws. The route ends on the street level near the commercial shops and transit activity.
